name: Cowboy1vs1
description:
This game is an online shooter game in a cartoon style with a top-down perspective, where you play as a cowboy against other players.

You will have access to multiple maps to fight in and challenge yourself.

Also this game includes a ranking system, so you will level up when you win a game.

Every game has a maximal amount of 10 rounds.

Every player has 5 hearts.

When you destroy all of them by defeating your enemy each round, you will win the game and earn some points and maybe even level up.

Otherwise you will loose the game and some points.

After each round the players can equip items, to upgrade their player and to become stronger.

Note: If there is no player in any lobby, then in order to play it, play the game with a friend.

You can play every character! Only in the mobile version on the App Store, in app purchase is activated.
